It enables clients to explore their portfolios in detail, analyze and compare metrics, discover opportunities, and access publications around our core themes and views, with just a tap, pinch or swipe. This represents the start of a journey to provide a Private Bank that is more open, transparent and collaborative, delivering a more personalized and engaging client experience.
